Detailed Description

Class describing the packet sent to the UserModule to get/increase/decrease the number of transactions for a user.

After the general RequestPacket-header the format is: {tabular}{rll} Position & Size & Description \ 0 & 4 bytes & UIN\ 4 & 4 bytes & Action type\ 8 & 4 bytes & Number transactions\ {tabular}

Definition at line 35 of file TransactionPacket.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum TransactionRequestPacket::action_t
 

The types of actions.

Enumeration values:
get  Just get the current number of transactions.
increase  Increase the number of transactions, return new value.
decrease  Decrease the number of transactions, return new value.
